The Trainers w/ Savage

Prebon sees that everyone seems to be attacking Savage. He leaps off 
the beast, and most of the shots hit his thick hide. He yells in 
pain. Prebon calls to everyone.

"Alright, order time! Ignatius, you take bot one(Bluestreak, see 
Alloran this time I remembered). Bullet, bot two!(Andromena) Hammer, 
bot three!(Ratchet) Blaze, take the other cat.(Logo's ice cat, forget 
name) I'll take the porcupine.(Spears)" Prebon looked around for bots 
that Savage could take. Than he spotted him. The bot that Savage hated
(Striker).

"Savage! There he is! Attack him!"

Savage stampeded towards Striker, firing two fireballs.

Ignatius landed infront of Bluestreak

"See ya....Ignatius transform!" The eagle went to bot mode and fired 
off two plasma shots at Bluestreak.

Bullet, already transformed, landed infront of Andromena. Never one 
for words, Bullet simply drew his gaitling gun and fired 150 shots.

Hammer, Prebon's second-in-command, ran up to Ratchet.

"You know...there's a reason they call me Hammer....(No, not because 
he has a hammer)" Hammer leaped into the air and came down with a 
kick to Ratchet's chest.

Blaze transformed to meet the snow cat.

"Cat fight...." She pulled out the flame thrower and started to burn 
the leopard.

Prebon gazed into Spears' eyes.

"You should feel honoured. You and your friends will be the very 
first bots on this planet defeated by the Trainers!" He opened his 
palm blasters and fired 3 shots at Spears.
